events.name: Innovision 6.0
events.subtitle: An Ideathon Competition
events.tagline: Innovate for a Greener Tomorrow: Shaping a Sustainable Future with Innovision 6.0
events.description: Are you ready to drive change? Innovision 6.0 is calling all visionaries and changemakers to showcase transformative ideas that merge sustainability with innovation. In this groundbreaking competition, we challenge participants to develop cutting-edge solutions that have the power to create lasting environmental and societal impact.
rules: Team Size: Maximum of three participants per team
Presentation Duration: 8–10 minutes per team, followed by a 2-minute Q&A session
Slide Requirement: Presentations must include a minimum of 8–10 slides
Focus Area: Must address key sustainability challenges and provide innovative solutions
judgingCriteria: Innovation: Originality and creativity of the idea
Methodology: Clear approach and plan for execution
Market Potential: Ability to scale and reach the target market
Feasibility: Practicality and viability of the solution
Presentation: Quality and clarity of the pitch

events.name: Gen AI Design Sprint
events.subtitle: Gen AI Poster Making Competition
events.description: Get ready for an exciting fusion of imagination and technology! The Gen AI Design Sprint challenges you to create visually stunning posters using the power of ChatGPT.
rules: Maximum of five prompts during the event
Theme will be provided at the beginning

events.name: Techno Treasure
events.subtitle: Treasure Hunt
events.tagline: Embark on a tech-filled adventure where every clue brings you closer to the treasure of knowledge!
events.description: Are you ready for an adventure that blends technology with excitement? Techno Treasure challenges you to solve puzzles, discover hidden clues, and navigate through a tech-filled journey.
rules: Team Size: Each team must consist of 2 players
Competition Structure: Three rounds in total
Clue Handling: Players must hold onto their clues until the game concludes
Completion Requirement: No mid-game withdrawals permitted

events.name: Techwiz
events.subtitle: Kahoot Quiz Competition
events.tagline: Knowledge is power, and with every challenge, we take a step closer to a greener, smarter future.
events.description: Get ready to embark on an exciting journey with the Techwhiz! Powered by Kahoot, this challenge invites you to dive into the world of green technology.

rounds.name: First Round
rules: Quiz on general reasoning and IT-related questions
30 seconds to read, 20 seconds to answer

rounds.name: Second Round
rules: 30 seconds to read, 10 seconds to answer
Three wrong answers eliminate the team

events.name: UX Marvels
events.subtitle: Figma UI Challenge
events.description: The UX Marvels: Figma Challenge is here to push your creative limits and test your skills in building user-centric, visually stunning digital interfaces.

markingCriteria.description: Consistency, pixel-perfect alignment, and overall polish
Composition, structure, and strategic use of white space
Unique design approaches and visual storytelling
Placement of CTAs, user-friendliness, and accessibility
Use of colors, images, and design elements

events.name: Reelify
events.subtitle: Reel Making Challenge
events.tagline: Innovate Today for a Sustainable Tomorrow: Pioneering the Future of Green Technology with Reelify
events.description: Create a 1-minute reel that highlights sustainable technology solutions, driving awareness and inspiring action.
rules: Team Size: Maximum of 2 participants per team
Content Focus: Must center on sustainable technology
AI-generated content allowed but must be disclosed
